TestDescription.name: Apache Tomcat version older than 6.0.9

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

TestDescription.Description:
[coolbox][dark]This alert was generated using only banner information. It may be a false positive. [/dark][/coolbox][break][bold]Fixed in Apache Tomcat 6.0.9:[/bold][break][ul]
[li] [bold]moderate[/bold]: Session hi-jacking CVE-2008-0128[break]
When using the SingleSignOn Valve via https the Cookie JSESSIONIDSSO is transmitted without the "secure" attribute, resulting in it being transmitted to any content that is - by purpose or error - requested via http from the same server. [/li]
[/ul][break]
[navy]Affected Apache Tomcat version (6.0.0 - 6.0.8).[/navy][break]
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade Apache Tomcat to the latest version.
